result.eng: Have the problems been overcome yet?
result.ga: ar sáraíodh na fadhbanna go fóill
result.orig: ar sáraíodh na fadhbanna go fóill
result.html: ar sáraíodh na fadhbanna go fóillHave the problems been overcome yet?
result.ponchtml: ar sáraíoḋ na faḋbanna go fóillHave the problems been overcome yet?

result.eng: How can we overcome these problems?
result.ga: conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárú
result.orig: conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárú
result.html: conas is féidir linn na fadhbanna seo a shárúHow can we overcome these problems?
result.ponchtml: conas is féidir linn na faḋbanna seo a ẛárúHow can we overcome these problems?

result.eng: We have finally overcome the problems.
result.ga: tá na fadhbanna cloíte againn faoi dheireadh
result.orig: tá na fadhbanna cloíte againn faoi dheireadh
result.html: tá na fadhbanna cloíte againn faoi dheireadhWe have finally overcome the problems.
result.ponchtml: tá na faḋbanna cloíte againn faoi ḋeireaḋWe have finally overcome the problems.
